text: puok( yeahou ti) del ban niyeay tha pitabrakd nasa a l laoh ban banhchea mk champoh puok yeung( knong k mi p rtav rt) min aoy puok yeung chue leu anakneasar na mneak laey louhtrate ke ban neamk aoy puok yeung nouv kuor hpa n del mean phleung( mk pi leumekh) cheh vea . chaur anak( mou ham meat) chhlaey tha pitabrakd nasa mean anakneasar cheachraen ban mokadl puok anak moun khnhom daoy neamk cheamuoy nouv phosdo tang cheachraen ning avei del puok anak ban teamtear nih choh hetoaveibeanchea puok anak samleab puokke( anakneasar) brasenbae puok anakchea anak troemotrauv men noh
